member.summary: Receives a list of all orders by filter
member.remarks:
Sample request: GET /Order/GetAllByFilter?OrderNumberFrom=1&OrderNumberTo=5&OrderDateFrom=2025-07-31&OrderDateTo=2025-07-31
Filter Parameters
Parameter Type Description
OrderNumberFrom integer Minimum order number (inclusive)
OrderNumberTo integer Maximum order number (inclusive)
OrderDateFrom date-time Start date of order period (inclusive)
OrderDateTo date-time End date of order period (inclusive)
Usage Notes
All parameters are optional
Date format should be ISO 8601 (e.g., YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS)
If both date filters are provided, OrderDateFrom must be ≤ OrderDateTo
If both number filters are provided, OrderNumberFrom must be ≤ OrderNumberTo
